timeline.message: Add method to define win url for caching and fixing tests

timeline.bodyText:
Please, add new test that verifies calling arguments for eventsService, like:
verify(eventsService).winUrlCaching(eq("bidId1"), eq("accountId"));

Then account declaration is not needed in all remaining tests.
Just change matching args there:
given(eventsService.winUrlCaching(anyString(), any())).willReturn("http://win-url");

any() will match null account ID.
This will keep tests more clean.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
No reason for adding all possible values, just use anyString().
Pls check all similar tests.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

timeline.bodyText:
Pls extract cacheBid.getBid() to separate variable.
Then bidId declaration can be omitted.
timeline.author: rpanchyk
rpanchyk
